title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 102.5 - Student declaration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 102.5 - Student declaration

State Regulations

At the close of each Regents examination, each candidate
shall subscribe his name to the following declaration on the answer
paper: "I do hereby affirm, at the close of this examination, that
I had no unlawful knowledge of the questions or answers prior to the
examination, and that I have neither given nor received assistance in answering
any of the questions during the examination."
No answer paper lacking this declaration, however
satisfactory in other respects, will be accepted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
102.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
